articles.description: MEGHAN MARKLE rejected offers of assistance from Sophie, Countess of Wessex, after expressing her grievances about royal life - the Countess then tried to talk to Prince Harry as well, during his recent UK visit.

articles.content: Wondering when you can watch Rick and Morty season 5 episode 1 this weekend? Below, we'll tell you when the show airs on Adult Swim in the US and E4 in the UK. After a fairly grim wait of almost two … [+2469 chars]

articles.title: Happy 80th birthday, Delia Smith! 10 lessons she has taught us – from eggs to lemon zesters - The Guardian
articles.description: The queen of cookery has shown the British public how to make toast, eat spaghetti and conjure up a lovely salsa verde – while acknowledging the importance of cheating
articles.content: Delia Smith cook, author, phenomenon, dictionary entry, Norwich City superfan turns 80 this week. Over five decades, she has taught several generations to cook countless recipes, including certain pu… [+5179 chars]
